name: fromeroad
description: the global npm scripts for fromeroad

scripts.dockerprod: @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command docker rm $(docker stop $(docker ps -aqf "name=^prod_fromeroad_api$")) && docker rmi prod_fromeroad_api_image && docker compose --env-file .env up -d
scripts.dockerdev: @powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command docker rm $(docker stop $(docker ps -aqf "name=^dev_fromeroad_api$")) && docker rmi dev_fromeroad_api_image && docker compose --env-file .dev.env up -d
scripts.dockerall: npm run dockerprod && npm run dockerdev
